original_title: Jim Walmsley: After being discharged from the military, running became a ‘bright point’ for the American. He hasn’t looked back since | CNN
article_summary: Ultra Trail du Mont Blanc runner Jim Walmsley, known for his love of running and overcoming personal struggles, is back to training after recovering from a knee injury, finding solace and a sense of purpose in the sport following a difficult period in his life, including a discharge from the Air Force due to a cheating scandal and DUI charge, and a battle with depression and suicidal ideation.</s>
